# Transportation

# Barcelona → Madrid

AVE (Train)

Monday, May 27

  • Depart from Barcelona-Sants
  • Arrive at Madrid-Puerta de Atocha
  • Will take ~3h
  • Tickets will be purchased in Spain

# Madrid → Córdoba

AVE (Train)

Wednesday, May 29

  • Depart from Madrid-Puerta de Atocha
  • Arrive at Córdoba
  • Will take ~2h
  • Tickets will be purchased in Spain
  • Note: Need to be in Córdoba by 9:00am

# Córdoba → Seville

AVE (Train)

Thursday, May 30

  • Depart from Córdoba
  • Arrive at Sevilla Santa Justa
  • Will take ~50m
  • Tickets will be purchased in Spain

# Seville → Granada

ALSA (Bus)

Friday, May 31

  • Depart from Plaza de Armas @ 6:00pm
  • Arrive at Granada Bus Station @ 9:00pm
  • Will take ~3h
  • Tickets

# Granada → Valencia

ALSA (Bus)

Saturday, June 1 - Sunday, June 2

  • Depart from Granada Bus Station @ 11:30pm
  • Arrive at Valencia Bus Station @ 7:00am (+1)
  • Will take ~7h 30m
  • Tickets

# Valencia → Palma

Trasmediterranea Ferry

Sunday, June 2 - Monday, June 3

  • Depart from Puerto de València Trasmediterranea @ 7:30pm
  • Arrive at Port de Palma de Mallorca @ 7:00am (+1)
  • Will take ~11h 30m
  • Tickets

# Palma → Barcelona

Trasmediterranea Ferry

Tuesday, June 4 - Wednesday, June 5

  • Depart from Puerto de València Trasmediterranea @ 11:55pm
  • Arrive at Puerto de Barcelona @ 7:30am (+1)
  • Will take ~7h 35m
  • Tickets
